author: Natasha Lomas
title: Uber Eats beefs up its grocery delivery offer as COVID-19 lockdowns continue
description: Uber Eats has beefed up grocery delivery options in three markets hard hit by the coronavirus. Uber’s food delivery division said today it’s inked a partnership with supermarket giant Carrefour in France to provide Parisians with 30 minute home delivery on a …
content:
